channel.title: Privacy Rights on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in Privacy Rights on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: H.R. 4978 - Online Privacy Act of 2019
item.description: Authors: Eshoo, Anna G. and Lofgren, Zoe Published: December 2019 URL: https://www.congress.gov/bill/116th-congress/house-bill/4978/text Abstract: To provide for individual rights relating to privacy of personal information, to establish privacy and security requirements for covered entities relating to personal information, and to establish an agency to be known as the United States Digital Privacy Agency to enforce such rights and requirements, and for other purposes.

item.title: Open Letter to Mark Zuckerberg: Facebook's "Privacy First" Proposals
Open Letter to Mark Zuckerberg: Facebook's End-to-End Security Plans
item.description: Published: October 2019 URL: https://cdt.org/insights/open-letter-facebooks-end-to-end-encryption-plans/ Abstract: Letter in support of end-to-end encryption from 112 signatory groups/associations.
